text: Multifurca roxburghiae is a species of mushroom-forming fungus in the genus Russulaceae. Found in Himachal Pradesh, India, where it associates with chir pine (Pinus roxburghii), it was described as new to science in 2008. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Russulales Category:Fungi described in 2008 Category:Fungi of Asia
title: Multifurca roxburghiae
